username.size: [ar] Must have min 4 and max 32 characters

password.size: [ar] Password must be at least 6 characters
password.pattern: [ar] Password must have at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number

file.size: [ar] Uploaded file cannot be bigger than {{size}}

activated.failure: [ar] This account is either active or invalid token
